ISSUE.TITLE: 403 error on user requests
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Steps to Reproduce: 1. Sign into a non-administrative user 2. Attempt to retrieve another user from `GET /auth/users/:userid/` ### Expected results: The user is sent back. ### Actual results: 403 error. This was broken by https://github.com/sunscrapers/djoser/commit/0d36af98ac26691678ac11b91d4b04c2e0e59a69. It completely restricts access to other users, rather than limiting it to read-only.
